question: What is the name of the Naval Exercise between India and Japan that was held recently?
explanation:
The Indian Navy and Japanese Maritime Self-Defence Force conducted bilateral Naval training exercises as a part of JUIMEX 2020.
This is the 4th edition of JIMEX that was held from September 26 to 28 in Northern Arabian Sea. JIMEX series commenced in January 2012 and is a biennial exercise with special focus on maritime security cooperation.
